recalling_firm: Golden Crown Bakery, Inc. dba Panzanella Bread Company
distribution_pattern: WA State only
product_description: Panino Tondo; and Small Tondo Bread;  No ingredient statement on label. No labeling agreement with consignees. Some of the packages list the name of the bread in the paper bag.    The 3lb designation is for dough weight, not net wt. Sliced breads are individually wrapped in in plastic and labeled only with a label that shows the product's name and company name. Unsliced, whole products are packed in a brown paper bag and are generally not labeled. The brown paper bags containing product may also be wrapped with a larger unlabeled plastic bag. More than one individually packaged unit can be placed in the larger plastic bag. Rolls are sold individually. Firm stated that product can be distinguished by size and shape from other products
reason_for_recall: Golden Crown Bakery, Inc. dba Panzanella is recalling all of their bread products due to undeclared soy, undeclared wheat and lack of product labeling.
